keywords: Peaceful vicinity, Breakthrough price, Well ventilated, Spacious, prime location
amenities: power backup, 24 hour security services, medical facilities
description: A furnished 1800 sq ft apartment is listed for rent in Ahar123, Pune which can be rented at a break-through and affordable price of Rs. 57,889. This east facing apartment has 7 bedrooms with 3 bathrooms as well. Apartment is located at 10th floor in a 20 storey building, though property is aged at 5-7 years and also provides 1 ample parking spaces. At a price of Rs.52,67,889, residents can enjoy a well ventilated and spacious home. Aher123 is one of the safest locality of Pune, holds a variety of well developed properties which lets the residents have an easy and luxurious life style with affordable prices. Facilities including power back-up and 24 hour security, makes this property extra special for families.

keywords: Peaceful vicinity, well ventilated, luxury lifestyle, spacious, vastu compliant

description: DLf phase 2 is one of the posh localities of Gurgaon and is well equipped with the facilities and green environment required to have a healthy and stable life.  In such peaceful vicinity, this well ventilated apartment is present with a massive area of 2000 sq ft.  This semi-furnished apartment is functional and is vastu compliant as well. Here are some interesting insights, the whole area has 3.5 bedrooms with 6 bathrooms. This east facing apartment, is proven to provide a luxurious lifestyle to the residents. With attached market within locality, apartment is listed at 1, Rs.10,00,000. Placed at the 8th floor on 12 storey building, the property does come with 2 ample parkings as well.

keywords: Reputed builder, peaceful vicinity, Fully renovated, luxury lifestyle, Family
amenities: Maintenance staff, cleaning services, balcony, built in wardrobe, day care center, attached market
description: Academic city, Banglore - Providing a luxury lifestyle and that too on a reasonable price point has been the star mark of this locality. Academic city offes a peaceful vicinity in a cluster of sky rised buildings and apartments. Under such prestige locality, this South West facing apartment has been listed out for RENT. Residents who seek a luxury lifestyle with the comfort and safety of a gated society are the best suited for the apartment. With 1800 sq ft of total area, 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom have been designed. This  unfurnished apartment comes from reputed builder which makes it safe and secure. Apartment holds 16th floor in a 24 storey residential building. Ample space for parking, maintenance staff and cleaning services comes with the apartment at a rental price of Rs.42,000.
